info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Hardee, northeastern Manatee, southwestern Polk and southeastern Hillsborough Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 524 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ona, or 9 miles west of Wauchula, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wauchula, Ona, Greater Sun Center, Zolfo Springs, Bradley Junction, Alafia River State Park, Myakka Head, Duette, Fort Green, Fort Lonesome and Wimauma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
